{{title|1=operator==,!={{small|(std::match_results)}}}}
{{cpp/regex/match_results/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|regex}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++11|1=
template&lt; class BidirIt, class Alloc &gt;
bool operator==( match_results&lt;BidirIt,Alloc&gt;&amp; lhs,
                 match_results&lt;BidirIt,Alloc&gt;&amp; rhs );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++11|until=c++20|1=
template&lt; class BidirIt, class Alloc &gt;
bool operator!=( match_results&lt;BidirIt,Alloc&gt;&amp; lhs,
                 match_results&lt;BidirIt,Alloc&gt;&amp; rhs );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Compares two {{tt|match_results}} objects.

Two {{tt|match_results}} are equal if the following conditions are met:
* neither of the objects is ''ready'', ''or''
* both match results are ''ready'' and the following conditions are met: 
:* {{c|lhs.empty()}} and {{c|rhs.empty()}}, ''or''
:* {{c|!lhs.empty()}} and {{c|!rhs.empty()}} and the following conditions are met:
::* {{c|1=lhs.prefix() == rhs.prefix()}}
::* {{c|1=lhs.size() == rhs.size() &amp;&amp; std::equal(lhs.begin(), lhs.end(), rhs.begin())}}
::* {{c|1=lhs.suffix() == rhs.suffix()}}

@1@ Checks if {{c|lhs}} and {{c|rhs}} are equal.
@2@ Checks if {{c|lhs}} and {{c|rhs}} are not equal.

{{rrev|since=c++20|
{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}
}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|match results to compare}}
{{par hreq}}
{{par req named|BidirIt|BidirectionalIterator}}
{{par req named|Alloc|Allocator}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
@1@ {{c|true}} if {{c|lhs}} and {{c|rhs}} are equal, {{c|false}} otherwise.
@2@ {{c|true}} if {{c|lhs}} and {{c|rhs}} are not equal, {{c|false}} otherwise.
